verbs.description: The deplorables [V: are] standing strong and banding together behind Roseanne Barr to save her cancelled show . Trump ’s former campaign manager Michael Caputo is courting Roseanne Barr and her cancelled ABC Roseanne sitcom to bring to his streaming service Bond , reports the New York Daily News . —Book reveals after Trump ’s victory our Forever President Obama worried …
